author: Merry
title: Jackie 'O' Henderson reveals the shock moment she thought her ex-husband had died as she celebrates 50th birthday live on-air
text:
Jackie ‘or’ Henderson revealed that she thought her ex -husband had died and was about to break the crying after a colleague said ‘she was no longer with us’ live in the air.
The Kiis FM star said that I initially feared the worst when her ‘Pete’ deleter de Peter interrupted the 50th birthday celebration of the breakfast program star on Friday to tell him that they had ‘lost’ their first husband, ‘ugly ‘Phil O’Neil.
Just when Henderson was about to cry, Doppler clarified that O’Neil was simply leaving the parent company of the network, RNA, where he organized a successful morning program at the sister station WSFM Gold during the last four years.
“What a hole, I liked it honestly exploding in crying,” he told his listeners.
‘That was brutal, it was. Honestly, at that time my heart was like … honestly it was like for a second, I thought I had died.
“I was about to … I could feel the tears that came, and then he said, you know, he leaves Arn.”
Nine has expelled Henderson’s ex a few months after he became the first person to overthrow the Talkback Radio Titan Ray Hadley of the network in the classifications for the first time in more than two decades.
The veteran station has renounced her successful morning program at WSFM Gold101.7 and is deserting the Sydney Sydney Station 2GB station, where a recently rebuilt night program will face.
Jackie ‘or’ Henderson was celebrating his 50th birthday live in the air when he was told that his first ‘ugo’ phil o’neil ‘husband was no longer with us’ and thought he had died
O’Neil briefly married his radio star Jackie ‘or’ Henderson in the 90s (above, together)
The Disc Jockey, which has provided its trade in some of the largest radio networks in the country throughout its four decades, including Nova, Triple M, 96fm and Star 104.5, will debut on nine radio on March 4.
O’Neil said that his new night program, which is executed from Tuesday to Fridays and will also be heard at the 4BC Sister Station with 2GB Brisbane headquarters, would fulfill his long ambition to make the transition to Talkback.
“All the roads that I have traveled have taken to this moment,” he said.
‘There are no finer radio stations to follow my conversation radius aspirations than in 2GB and 4BC.
“This is really the most exciting and fundamental moment of my career.”
The measure occurs only a few months after O’Neil spectacularly the 2GB 2GB host of 2GB, Ray Hadley, in his second classifications survey last November before hanging his microphone for the last time last month.
The surprise victory was the culmination of four years of work in WSFM of O’Neil, who joined the west attire of Sydney in 2020 and gradually built his audience of the morning program while claiming the acra prize of the industry for the best host of the Music last year.
He said he was sad to leave his ‘second home’, but waiting for the new challenge of winning another new audience.
O’Neil has renounced its successful WSGM Gold morning program and has defected Talkback Station 2GB
“WSFM Gold101.7 has been more than just my radio station during the last four years, it has been my second home,” O’Neil said.
‘I will definitely miss the laughs with my fantastic co -workers and also with the listeners who have become such great friends. Devils … I could even miss playing Roxette!
The content director of the Gold Network, Sue Carter, said they had agreed to free O’Neil from her early contract to be able to follow her Talkback dream and left the media company in good terms.
“Phil is unique in his class, I have known him for decades and during that time I have seen that his radio passion only becomes stronger,” he said.
‘When he told us that he had the opportunity to organize a program overnight in 2GB, we do not hesitate to free him from any contractual obligation.
‘While we will miss him in the air, we are excited by him as he embarks on this next adventure.
“We send it with our best wishes and a great thanks for everything that has brought to the station.”
Radio Radio Content Manager Greg Byrnes said that signing O’Neil was a coup d’etat for both the network and his listeners.
O’Neil has been working in the same building as his ex -wife and his radio star Jackie ‘or’ Henderson and his breakfast Kyle Sandiland during the last four years
O’Neil briefly became the new radio host of Sydney’s morning radio in its time interval last November
“Phil will bring fresh energy at night and is an exciting addition to our new alignments in Sydney and Brisbane,” he said.
‘It is attractive, entertaining and has loyal followers. Phil loves the Talk Radio and our morning listeners will love to meet him ‘.
When the WSFM radio presenter dethroned Hadley in Sydney’s morning hours played in November, it was the first time that the 2GB radio king had lost a survey of qualifications in two decades.
O’Neil, who organizes his 9 am to 1 pm program, took the pole position after attracting 12.7 percent of the available audience, raising 0.5 percentage points.
Hadley had enjoyed an undefeated survey of 160 qualifications, when his show fell 1.3 percentage points, obtaining a 11.1 percent participation, third place after Smoothfm 95.3 with 11.2 percent of the audience.
However, he recovered first place the following month in his latest radio grades survey before retiring.
Phil began his radio career in the 1990s as the host of the Hot30 countdown before landing in Nova 969 and Triple M.
In 2004, he returned to the United Kingdom and worked on the radio before traveling back to Australia.
O’Neil knocked Ray Hadley 2GB in the second Talkback Titan classifications before his retirement, just for the outgoing host to recover first place the next month
Jackie ‘or’ Henderson met
The move to WSFM saw him working in the same building as his ex-wife Jackie ‘or’ Henderson, who co-anfila the popular FM breakfast program at the Kiis 106.5 RNA, which is transmitted from 6 am to 10 am to 10 am
Henderson and his Kyle Sandiland Coanfrerion have once again claimed the upper position for their breakfast time interval despite a drop to 13.1 percent of the audience.
The couple met while working together on the coast of Gold in the 1990 Just a year later.
His separation in 1999 led to his final radio program and Phil to return to the United Kingdom.
Henderson married Lee Henderson, with whom he shares his daughter, 12 -year -old Kitty, before they broke in 2018 after 15 years of marriage.
Jackie and Phil separated in 1999. He married Lee Henderson with whom he shares his daughter, Kitty, 12. The couple separated in 2018 after 15 years of marriage. (All in the photo)
Jackie has not left publicly with anyone from the separation, but British photographer Lee has continued with Jujitsu instructor Gabriella Motta.
When asked about his first marriage by news reader Kiis FM Brooklyn Ross in the air last year, Henderson refused to reveal who was responsible for his division.
“When I was married to Fea Phil, he was a great radio star and I was working from 9 to 5 at a real estate agency,” Jackie explained.
Brooklyn then asked: “I know this is an ancient story, but did you leave it or leave you?”
‘How do you dare Brooklyn? My own friend, ‘Jackie surprised.
